About Me

Hi, I'm Shivam Janda, and I’m from the city of Markham, Ontario. I’m currently a student at Durham College, where I’m enrolled in the Computer Programming and Analyst program. My journey doesn’t stop here, though! I’m working hard to transfer to Ontario Tech University, aiming to earn my Computer Science degree.

My Passion

I’m deeply passionate about two things in life: programming and fitness. The combination of the two is what drives me to succeed. I’m always excited by technology and its potential to create big impacts the world. Programming challenges me in many ways, pushing me to think critically, solve problems creatively, and constantly learn.

My Fitness Journey

Outside of my tech hobbies, you’ll find me hitting the gym regularly. I truly believe that a healthy body supports a healthy mind, and I’m dedicated to maintaining a balanced, active lifestyle. Whether it's lifting weights or focusing on a fitness goal, the gym has taught me discipline and perseverance, which I would like to bring in every area of my life.

My Goal

Ultimately, my goal is to land a role at a big tech company, where I can contribute to cutting-edge projects while continuing to grow both personally and professionally.

Contact Information
